message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $150. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the price I'm willing to pay for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $80 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $130. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. That's the price I'm willing to pay for it.
Bob, I understand where you're coming from, but I can't go as low as $90. I can do $110, and that's my absolute final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's my final offer. I really need to stick to my budget.
